job.title: Team Manager for Digital, Automation, and Interpretation

bulletedlist.item: Perform regular performance reviews and coaching sessions.
Conduct interviews and provide hiring recommendations.
Collaborate with senior leadership to align team goals with strategic business objectives.
Manage resource planning, project delegation, and training initiatives.
Report on key metrics, project status, and risks to stakeholders in monthly progress meetings.
Maintain all research and development work and project management responsibilities from the Senior Research Engineer role.
